publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1653 Mr Bruce McFee: Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band—That the Parliament congratulates all the members of the Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band for a fantastic season when it was crowned Champion of Champions of the Novice Juvenile Grade, won three of the five major competitions of the season: the Scottish Championships, the World Championships and the Cowal Championships, and came second at the remaining two major competitions: the British Championships and the European Championships; notes the hard work and dedication that has been in existence since the band was formed in 1998; further notes that the band has become the Pride of Inverclyde for this year, and extends its best wishes to the band for the 2005 season.

S2M-1653 Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band (lodged on 7 September 2004) Richard Lochhead*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Fergus Ewing*, Murray Tosh*, Bruce Crawford*, Ms Sandra White*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Michael Matheson*, Trish Godman*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1653 Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band (lodged on 7 September 2004) Mike Pringle*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-1653 Mr Bruce McFee: Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band—That the Parliament congratulates all the members of the Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band for a fantastic season when it was crowned Champion of Champions of the Novice Juvenile Grade, won three of the five major competitions of the season: the Scottish Championships, the World Championships and the Cowal Championships, and came second at the remaining two major competitions: the British Championships and the European Championships; notes the hard work and dedication that has been in existence since the band was formed in 1998; further notes that the band has become the Pride of Inverclyde for this year, and extends its best wishes to the band for the 2005 season. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Roseanna Cunningham, Fergus Ewing, Murray Tosh, Bruce Crawford, Ms Sandra White, Jim Mather, Rob Gibson, Christine Grahame, Michael Matheson, Trish Godman, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mike Pringle, Mr Brian Monteith
S2M-1653 Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band (lodged on 7 September 2004) Dr Jean Turner*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1653 Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band (lodged on 7 September 2004) Frances Curran*
S2M-1653 Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band (lodged on 7 September 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1653 Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band (lodged on 7 September 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1653 Inverclyde Juvenile Pipe Band (lodged on 7 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
